conditions.name: Filter 3: 02H Down && 4H Side &&  1H Medium, Steep or Extreme

javascriptCode.name: New Javascript Code
javascriptCode.code: if (chart.at02hs.bollingerChannel.direction === "Down" && chart.at12hs.bollingerChannel.direction === "Down" && chart.at04hs.bollingerSubChannel.slope === "Side" && (chart.at01hs.bollingerSubChannel.slope === "Medium" || chart.at01hs.bollingerSubChannel.slope === "Steep" || chart.at01hs.bollingerSubChannel.slope === "Extreme")) {false} else {true}
